Name: Legend of Egypt - Pharaohs Garden 2 - The sacred crocodile
About the game: In this match 3 game, a new exciting adventure in ancient Egypt awaits you! A sinister curse has been placed on an oasis. Explore the mystery of the sacred crocodile and help it lift the curse and turn the oasis back into a thriving paradise. Enjoy challenging levels as well as puzzle and bonus games, upgrades, extras, trophies and a gripping storyline! Features - Challenging Match 3 game with lots of extras - Play through many levels and extra levels - Create a thriving paradise - Win various bonuses, upgrades, trophies and extras - Solve exciting puzzles and bonus games
